channel.title: Broken Realm
channel.description:
[center][b][u][size=18pt]Broken Realm![/size][/u][/b][/center]
In order to Join the Broken Realm Team! You must feel out this application!
[code]Name: Java experience: Experience Proof: What you hope to do for this development: Age: Skype: Position you want: Website Developer/Admin-InGame/Mod-Ingame/Admin-Forums/Mod-Forums/Server[And-Or]Client Coder
You MAY choose more then 1 position if you wish[/code]
[b]This is a Hybrid v3 PVP Source+Client base. It's [u]317[/u] loading [u]525[/u].[/b] I'll list some [b]features[/b] below.
[code]634 Items - Check Shop Picture 602 Npc's Summoning - Cats, Dogs, Penguin, Dragons [Dragons are donator only] Perfect Leeching Anims Flashing are fixed - hand cannon stance works without flashing Allot Of Shops - Check Shop Picture Good Bosses - Avatar Of Destruction and Penance Queen going to be added Always players ! Easy Training - ::pure command added Mods/Admin Commands - ::jail ::unjail ::mute ::unmute ::bank ::kick ::ban ::unban ::checkbank [Username] Player Commands - ::trade ::home ::barrows ::pure ::resetdef ::changepassword I also added a staffzone
And many more that I cannot think of at this moment.[/code]
This server is based on Economy [u]AND[/u] Pking! However, I have a problem with the Economy!
[b]Down below, I'll post some problems that I need help coding.[/b]
[code]1. Economy - The Economy fails horribly. NPCDrops don't work to their fullest extent. I need someone to help recode the Drop Method.
2. My Barrows are up top. - This make their drop degraded. I need someone to help me recode this and fix this. Until this is fixed, I'll have them drop a fully repaired barrows helmet.
3. Barrows only drop helmets. - Like I mentioned before, NPCDrops don't work to their fullest extend. If I make them drop the rest of the Barrows Armor, it will drop Helm/Chestplate/legs/weapon. And I'd rather them drop 1 barrows piece at a time.
4. Items Kept on Death Interface - I've searched and searched, yet nothing I found helps me. The Items Kept On Death Interface works. HOWEVER, it does NOT show what items you actually keep or lose on death.
5. I need someone to help me rewrite the PkPoint system. The Codes for the Pk system, fail... and I can't seem to find them. >->
Their is probably more, but we'll cross that bridge when it comes.[/code]
[b]Down Below, I'll post some pictures of the server.[/b]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/5zqio3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ra5abm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/23kf2b6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/zsshow.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2s66n1w.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2n8y1oo.jpg[/img]
[b][u]Here's a picture of the Item's Kept On Death Interface...[/u][/b]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2i7yalk.jpg[/img]
If you are interest in joining the Broken Realm Team, then just fill out the application and post it below! I'll let you know rather you are accepted or not, and if you are, I'll add you on skype!
[center][b][u][size=14pt]80% Complete until Releasing to the Public to play on![/size][/u][/b][/center]
[center]-Thanks! -Broken Realm Owner, -xSilentCloud/Chains424[/center]

item.title: Broken Realm
item.dc:creator: @chains424 chains424
item.description:
@chains424 wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Broken Realm![/size][/center]

In order to Join the Broken Realm Team! You must feel out this application!

[code]Name:
Java experience:
Experience Proof:
What you hope to do for this development:
Age:
Skype:
Position you want: Website Developer/Admin-InGame/Mod-Ingame/Admin-Forums/Mod-Forums/Server[And-Or]Client Coder

You MAY choose more then 1 position if you wish[/code]

This is a Hybrid v3 PVP Source+Client base.
It’s 317 loading 525.
I’ll list some features below.

[code]634 Items - Check Shop Picture
602 Npc’s
Summoning - Cats, Dogs, Penguin, Dragons [Dragons are donator only]
Perfect Leeching
Anims Flashing are fixed - hand cannon stance works without flashing
Allot Of Shops - Check Shop Picture
Good Bosses - Avatar Of Destruction and Penance Queen going to be added
Always players !
Easy Training - ::pure command added
Mods/Admin Commands - ::jail ::unjail ::mute ::unmute ::bank ::kick ::ban ::unban ::checkbank [Username]
Player Commands - ::trade ::home ::barrows ::pure ::resetdef ::changepassword
I also added a staffzone

And many more that I cannot think of at this moment.[/code]

This server is based on Economy AND Pking!
However, I have a problem with the Economy!

Down below, I’ll post some problems that I need help coding.

[code]1. Economy - The Economy fails horribly. NPCDrops don’t work to their fullest extent. I need someone to help recode the Drop Method.

  1. My Barrows are up top. - This make their drop degraded. I need someone to help me recode this and fix this. Until this is fixed, I’ll have them drop a fully repaired barrows helmet.

  2. Barrows only drop helmets. - Like I mentioned before, NPCDrops don’t work to their fullest extend. If I make them drop the rest of the Barrows Armor, it will drop Helm/Chestplate/legs/weapon. And I’d rather them drop 1 barrows piece at a time.

  3. Items Kept on Death Interface - I’ve searched and searched, yet nothing I found helps me. The Items Kept On Death Interface works. HOWEVER, it does NOT show what items you actually keep or lose on death.

  4. I need someone to help me rewrite the PkPoint system. The Codes for the Pk system, fail… and I can’t seem to find them. >->

Their is probably more, but we’ll cross that bridge when it comes.[/code]

Down Below, I’ll post some pictures of the server.

5zqio3.jpg765×554

ra5abm.jpg769×555

23kf2b6.jpg767×556

zsshow.jpg770×556

2s66n1w.jpg772×553

2n8y1oo.jpg772×550

Here’s a picture of the Item’s Kept On Death Interface…

2i7yalk.jpg770×551

If you are interest in joining the Broken Realm Team, then just fill out the application and post it below!
I’ll let you know rather you are accepted or not, and if you are, I’ll add you on skype!

[center][size=14pt]80% Complete until Releasing to the Public to play on![/size][/center]

[center]-Thanks!
-Broken Realm Owner,
-xSilentCloud/Chains424[/center]
